About the Author

Volodymyr Bachynskyi

  • An ethical hacker since the dawn of the digital frontier, wielding code as a virtuous sword.
  • Holder of 3 diplomas of higher education and numerous certificates.
  • A part of an InfoSec team in the top-rated Ukrainian IT company of 2023.
  • Developer of an esoteric programming language.
  • A spiritual seeker, biohacker, writer, and philanthropist.
  • Nurturing the next generation of hackers as a proud father of three kids.

From time to time, I embark on research endeavors and lead mastermind groups. Currently, amidst my professional progress in automotive and IoT security, I am undertaking personal research that delves into the digital and intangible processes of the human body and beyond. Due to obvious reasons, the practice and results are not fully disclosed on the blog, but I take pleasure in sharing them with my supporters.

If you are interested in cybersecurity, personal development aspects, expanding your knowledge, or simply wish to contribute to progress for the greater good, you can enter your email in the form below to receive further instructions.
